Uses of Package
fr.upmc.components.cvm

  • Packages that use fr.upmc.components.cvm 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components.cvm
    Component virtual machines for both single computer and distributed deployments.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs
    Basic client/server example In this example, a basic client/server is constructed.
  • Classes in fr.upmc.components.cvm used by fr.upmc.components.cvm 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCVM
    The class AbstractCVM defines the common properties of component virtual machines in the component model.
    ComponentVirtualMachineI
    The interface ComponentVirtualMachineI defines the common behaviours of component virtual machines for component-based applications.
    DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI
    The interface DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI defines the common behaviours of component virtual machines that are deployed on multiple JVM, themselves possibly running on multiple hosts.
  • Classes in fr.upmc.components.cvm used by fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCVM
    The class AbstractCVM defines the common properties of component virtual machines in the component model.
    AbstractDistributedCVM
    The class AbstractDistributedCVM defines the common properties of distributed component virtual machines in the component model.
    ComponentVirtualMachineI
    The interface ComponentVirtualMachineI defines the common behaviours of component virtual machines for component-based applications.
    DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI
    The interface DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI defines the common behaviours of component virtual machines that are deployed on multiple JVM, themselves possibly running on multiple hosts.
